base_description: White ceramic teapot, round shape, modern style.
part_description: Includes a round body, curved spout, circular lid, and small handle. The spout is on one side, the handle opposite, with the lid on top.
internal_interaction_description: The lid sits snugly on top of the teapot, sealing the opening to retain heat. The spout is connected to the body, allowing liquid to flow out smoothly. The handle is attached to the side, providing a grip for pouring.
external_interaction_description: The teapot is used to pour beverages, interacting with cups or mugs. It can be held by the handle and filled through the lid. It interacts with heat sources when brewing tea or other hot drinks.
